abstract.p: Latest oversized bags noted; photo (Pulse column: Handbag Special) (S)

block.p: With fitted suits, pumps and pearls, this is a season of Park Avenue chic, and the handbag is its centerpiece. The new crop comes in ultraclassic shapes and sizes, from doctor bags to whisper-thin clutches, in luxe crocodile, pampered-prep tweeds and the two-tone shades of a vintage Rolls-Royce. The X factor is quiet opulence.

THINK SMALL, NOT WIMPY Winter's ladylike clutches may be diminutive but are no shrinking violets. Whether a gold metallic leather clutch by Lambertson Truex ($395) or a Pologeorgis Furs dyed tangerine fox fur envelope ($395), the clutch holds a lipstick, an A.T.M. card and a cell phone with style. ''They're part of the 80's runway trend of this season,'' said Mimi Shin, accessories director for Harper's Bazaar. ''And they're sexier.''
